General.Name: Gree Real Estate Co Ltd
General.Description: Gree Real Estate Co., Ltd. operates in the real estate sector in China. It develops and sells mid-to-high-end residential buildings in Zhuhai, Shanghai, Chongqing, and Sanya areas. The company was formerly known as Xi'an Gree Real Estate Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Gree Real Estate Co., Ltd. in February 2012. Gree Real Estate Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is based in Zhuhai City, China.
General.Address: No. 213, Shihua West Road, Zhuhai, China, 519020
